## MongoDBRepository.hardDeleteById() method

Delete a document by its ID (hard)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
hardDeleteById(id: MongoIdExt): Promise<any>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  id | MongoIdExt | ID of the document to HARD delete |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;any&gt;
